languages.text: {n}Идира неловко прокашливается и неуверенно кивает.{/n} "Ну, надеюсь, что вы правы, Лорд-капитан. Молнию в брюшину словить не самый приятный опыт, так что будем надеяться, что Император не отвлекся сейчас на что-то поважнее".

traits.locale_text: {n}Идира неловко прокашливается и неуверенно кивает.{/n} "Ну, надеюсь, что вы правы, Лорд-капитан. Молнию в брюшину словить не самый приятный опыт, так что будем надеяться, что Император не отвлекся сейчас на что-то поважнее".
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira awkwardly clears her throat and nods, not looking too convinced.{/n} "I hope you're right, Lord Captain. Taking a lightning bolt to the gut is something I'd like to avoid, so here's hoping the Emperor doesn't have anything more important to protect right now."
languages.original_text: {n}Идира неловко прокашливается и неуверенно кивает.{/n} "Ну, надеюсь, что вы правы, Лорд-капитан. Молнию в брюшину словить не самый приятный опыт, так что будем надеяться, что Император не отвлекся сейчас на что-то поважнее".

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira awkwardly clears her throat and nods, not looking too convinced.{/n} "I sure hope you're right, Lord Captain. Taking a lightning to my gut is something I'd like to avoid, so here's hoping the Emperor doesn't have anything more important to protect right now."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira awkwardly clears her throat and nods, not looking too convinced.{/n} "I sure hope you're right, Lord Captain. Taking a lightning to my gut is something I'd like to avoid, so here's hoping the Emperor doesn't have anything more important to protect right now."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira awkwardly clears her throat and nods, not looking too convinced.{/n} "I hope you're right, Lord Captain. Taking a lightning bolt to the gut is something I'd like to avoid, so here's hoping the Emperor doesn't have anything more important to protect right now."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira awkwardly clears her throat and nods, not looking too convinced.{/n} "I hope you're right, Lord Captain. Taking a lightning bolt to the gut is something I'd like to avoid, so here's hoping the Emperor doesn't have anything more important to protect right now."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉尴尬地清了清嗓子，点了点头，看起来不太信服。{/n}“我希望你说得没错，舰长大人。我可不想被什么莫名其妙的咒语劈死，所以我希望帝皇现在没有更重要的东西要保护。”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira awkwardly clears her throat and nods, not looking too convinced.{/n} "I hope you're right, Lord Captain. Taking a lightning bolt to the gut is something I'd like to avoid, so here's hoping the Emperor doesn't have anything more important to protect right now."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉尴尬地清了清嗓子，点了点头，看起来不太信服。{/n}“我希望你说得没错，舰长大人。我可不想被什么莫名其妙的咒语劈死，所以我希望帝皇现在没有更重要的东西要保护。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira se aclara la garganta, incómoda, y asiente sin convicción.{/n} «Espero que tenga razón, Lord Capitán. No me gustaría recibir el impacto de un rayo en la tripa, así que confío en que el Emperador no tenga nada más importante que proteger ahora mismo».
languages.original_text: {n}Idira awkwardly clears her throat and nods, not looking too convinced.{/n} "I hope you're right, Lord Captain. Taking a lightning bolt to the gut is something I'd like to avoid, so here's hoping the Emperor doesn't have anything more important to protect right now."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira se aclara la garganta, incómoda, y asiente sin convicción.{/n} «Espero que tenga razón, Lord Capitán. No me gustaría recibir el impacto de un rayo en la tripa, así que confío en que el Emperador no tenga nada más importante que proteger ahora mismo».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira räuspert sich verlegen und nickt, sieht aber nicht allzu überzeugt aus.{/n} "Hoffentlich habt Ihr recht, Lord Captain. Ich würde es gerne vermeiden, einen Blitzschlag in den Magen zu bekommen. Hoffen wir also, dass der Imperator im Moment nichts Wichtigeres zu beschützen hat."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira awkwardly clears her throat and nods, not looking too convinced.{/n} "I hope you're right, Lord Captain. Taking a lightning bolt to the gut is something I'd like to avoid, so here's hoping the Emperor doesn't have anything more important to protect right now."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira räuspert sich verlegen und nickt, sieht aber nicht allzu überzeugt aus.{/n} "Hoffentlich habt Ihr recht, Lord Captain. Ich würde es gerne vermeiden, einen Blitzschlag in den Magen zu bekommen. Hoffen wir also, dass der Imperator im Moment nichts Wichtigeres zu beschützen hat."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}イディラはぎこちなく咳払いをして、あまり納得していない様子でうなずいた。{/n}「そうだといいんだけどね、ロード・キャプテン。稲妻をお腹に受けるなんてことはあたいも避けたいわ。皇帝が今、守るべき大切なものを何も持っていないことを祈るだけよ」
languages.original_text: {n}Idira awkwardly clears her throat and nods, not looking too convinced.{/n} "I hope you're right, Lord Captain. Taking a lightning bolt to the gut is something I'd like to avoid, so here's hoping the Emperor doesn't have anything more important to protect right now."

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラはぎこちなく咳払いをして、あまり納得していない様子でうなずいた。{/n}「そうだといいんだけどね、ロード・キャプテン。稲妻をお腹に受けるなんてことはあたいも避けたいわ。皇帝が今、守るべき大切なものを何も持っていないことを祈るだけよ」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira s'éclaircit maladroitement la gorge et hoche la tête, apparemment peu convaincue.{/n} « J'espère que vous avez raison, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Je préférerais éviter de recevoir un éclair dans le ventre. Espérons que l'Empereur n'a personne de plus important à protéger en ce moment. »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira awkwardly clears her throat and nods, not looking too convinced.{/n} "I hope you're right, Lord Captain. Taking a lightning bolt to the gut is something I'd like to avoid, so here's hoping the Emperor doesn't have anything more important to protect right now."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira s'éclaircit maladroitement la gorge et hoche la tête, apparemment peu convaincue.{/n} « J'espère que vous avez raison, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Je préférerais éviter de recevoir un éclair dans le ventre. Espérons que l'Empereur n'a personne de plus important à protéger en ce moment. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}İdira, tuhafça öksürerek başını sallıyor. Pek ikna olmuş gibi gözükmüyor.{/n} "Umarım haklısındır Lord Kaptan. Ağır bir şimşek darbesi almak, en son isteyeceğim şey. Umarım İmparator'un şu an koruması gereken daha önemli şeyleri yoktur."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira awkwardly clears her throat and nods, not looking too convinced.{/n} "I hope you're right, Lord Captain. Taking a lightning bolt to the gut is something I'd like to avoid, so here's hoping the Emperor doesn't have anything more important to protect right now."

traits.locale_text: {n}İdira tuhafça öksürerek başını sallıyor. Pek ikna olmuş gibi gözükmüyor.{/n} "Umarım haklısındır Lord Kaptan. Ağır bir şimşek darbesi almak en son isteyeceğim şey. Umarım İmparator'un şu an koruması gereken daha önemli şeyleri yoktur."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
